text:
It would be nice if <exec> task can spawn OS commands without waiting for them 
to complete. For example, to be able to start up 'rmiregistry' and then run the 
Java classes via <java> task that can connect to the rmi registry.

PS. I'm brand new to Bugzilla, I did a search and couldn't find anything on 
<exec>. Please forgive me if this is a duplicate.

Regards, Bagi.

I guess the <parallel> task if what you are looking for.
See http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/manual/CoreTasks/parallel.html
